para: There is no end-user command-line tool for WebMDS.

section.title: Tool description
section.para: The command-line tool webmds-create-context-file is used to create Tomcat configuration files needed to deploy WebMDS.

section.title: Command syntax
section.para: The tomcat_context_file argument is the location of the Tomcat configuration file defining the WebMDS context; in a default Tomcat installation, the location of this file will be $CATALINA_HOME/conf/Catalina/localhost.
By default, webmds-create-context-file will not overwrite an existing context file; the -f option is used to force webmds-create-context-file to overwrite an existing file.

section.title: Limitations
section.para: Changes to the Tomcat context do not take effect until Tomcat is restarted or reloaded.
